name: zem
text:
Ray lays it down

He is not just saying the guy is a gay magician, but is something a gay magician would sell at his garage sale

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ewin, tttt, Kensai, SurelySmack)

name: professoryes
text:
We can laugh all we want about gay magicians and their garage sales, but the gay magician would probably have immaculate taste.

And Mantonio wouldn't know it.

name: pogo
text: Gay magician garage sales are ... well... magic!

name: zaratustra
text: And gay.

name: tekende
text: Magically delicious.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh my God, I never thought about it in that sense, I just assumed, as zem apparently did, that Ray thinks Tina bought him from a gay magician.

name: spinynorman
text: Dittos.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: deusoma
text: The look on Ditto's face leads me to believe he's finally figured out that he's a one-trick-pony. Ah well. At least he's in high demand as a breeding centre love machine. </nerd>

name: carlyle
text:
Could you imagine the ladies he gets and in so many numbers.

I mean unless it's a Mr. Mime then it's just kinda fucked up and creepy.

name: deusoma
text: No fear, there are no lady Mr. Mimes, so a lady-oriented Ditto would never have to bed them. Jynx, on the other hand...

name: carpetbag
text:
This is incorrect; there are in fact lady Mr. Mimes. It is because its Japanese name makes no reference to a specific gender.

You can trust what I say because a Mankey is my avatar.

name: soticoto
text:
carpetbag uses explanation.
It is Super Effective.

name: geysershitdick
text: Furthermore, I believe the implication is that Mantonio looks like a gay magician's assistant.

name: ghostd
text: Man, Ray is brutal.

name: ssddr
text: This strip implies that Todd's attempt at joining the mile high club must have had some complications, which are left to our imagination, which is great.

name: waddlerz
text: SAD

name: yingkaixing
text: Do you have to pay does to S.A.D. or is it more of a non-profit thing? Do they print you up a card to carry in your wallet?

name: yingkaixing
text: Damnit, *dues

name: riotdejaneiro
text: It's not a non-profit thing. At least not for the participant. Hey-o!

name: spenham
text: META COMMENTS!!!

name: berami
text: I was going to say just that. That's what I get for not registering until this month.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Man, even the characters that only appear in one strip are hilariously unique.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I really wouldn't find this one very funny, except that the dude's name is "Mantonio". To quote Chucklebot, "The Fonz called to mention that he wants his prime time-friendly faux dago sexuality back".

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: The fact that Ray tells them to "scram!" as if they were kids running on his lawn is priceless.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by glorify, MinorTough, equinn2006, lux)

name: cdl146
text:
I love the alt text.

"I yam... Mannntonio." Onstad is the master of making accents and dialects is incredible.

name: gussiejives
text: That's some unibrow Mantonio has.

name: stuart
text: A comment left by stuart was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NaughtyByN8ture, shoinan, Darthemed)

name: _cheesekayke
text: I rated this a five just for the word Mantonio.

name: slalvation
text: Dude, so did I!

name: crinklebat
text: I love it when Ray just busts out this kind of insult.

name: riazm
text: Mantonio talks in italics, kid's got class.

name: erinye
text: "Or did your hands meet in the dumpster behind Olive Garden?" is pretty much the best verbal smackdown in recorded history. I may have to make more use of it in the future.

name: geysershitdick
text: I think we can all relate to the experience of seeing an ex-girlfriend with a Mantonio on her arm.

name: madmangosteen
text: yes indeedy

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
not yet

thankfully

i almost said 'thank you, Jesus' but that could have just been some other dude.

name: footslogga
text:
haha Olive Garden!

my ugly friends go there

name: tekende
text: Man screw you Olive Garden has some delicious food

name: biznart
text: It is certainly better than Sbarro

name: lavosxii
text: Mantonio isn't even real Italian. He is Olive Garden Italian.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I remember reading this strip on my first trip through the archives and thinking the concept of somebody named Mantonio was the most hilarious thing ever.

I still think that. And now I have Acheworld membership so I express how much I still think that. It's enough to make me comment.

name: charchar
text: I am willing to bet his name is just 'Antonio,' But he says it as "I yammm-antonio" and that's how Tina interpreted it.

name: heccibiggs
text: No, no! His name is Mantonio! "Mantonio" is a real thing! At least in Achewood!

name: i_love_kate
text: I DON'T LIKE YOU ANYMORE CHARLIE

name: tttt2
text: Tina wouldn't have shown up if Ray's name wasn't covered up on the sign

name: tekende
text:
I eat at a Mexican restaurant with my extended family for dinner about once a week, and there is this waiter there who is handsome, almost to the point of cheesiness, and he has a silver tooth or three. My cousins and I refer to him as Mantonio.

Also at the restaurant: Mandrew, Manthony, and Mandy.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: captikles

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ..what news of the yadda-yadda-yadda.

name: milo
text: "Couples Only"

name: milo
text: "Couples Only"

name: milo
text: fuck, the faulty double-clicking mouse strikes again!

name: moishe_weinberg
text: Tina would not have gone inside if Ray hadn't obscured his name on the sign with the announcement that only couples are allowed. I just noticed that.

name: moishe_weinberg
text: Arrrrrgh tttt2 beat me to it.
